alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 1:06AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 14 inches above 7000 feet with 2 to 6 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph in lower elevations and up to 120 mph along Sierra ridges. Wave heights on Lake Tahoe 3 to 6 feet. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. The strong winds and weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
